author: agilliland
msg: modified weblogentry.pubtime field type from "timestamp" to "datetime".
migration script now has an alter table statement to modify the existing column for upgrades.

author: radup
msg: Zero-arg constructor of GDuration did not properly initialize the fractions of a second field.

author: agilliland
msg: updating velocity macros which use references to $userName for urls to use $website.handle now.

author: jdcasey
msg: Resolving: MNG-920, and setting the version of maven-release-plugin to a rev of -beta-1 instead of -SNAPSHOT, to allow locally installed versions to work without tweaking the version locally.

author: sppatel
msg: custom eclipse post goal to specify exported entries
